attributes.action: Ensure Goverment stands by the Single Market pledges made in it's 2015 manifesto
attributes.additional_details: Information sourced from the Conservative Manifesto 2015
attributes.background:
In the Conservative 2015 Manifesto. These statements were made:
We say:
1) Yes to the Single Market
2) Yes to turbo- charging free trade
3) Yes to working together where we are stronger together than alone

The PM is totally ingnoring these statements & persuing completely the opposite.
